allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add CodersHive Operations Dashboard with Supabase integration

- Add authentication with Supabase Auth
- Add dashboard layout with sidebar navigation
- Add master data management \(Identities, Websites, Cards\)
- Add platform management \(ClickBank, Digistore24, etc.\)
- Add forms with grouped sections and validation
- Add data store with Supabase CRUD operations
- Add RLS policies for secure data access
- Update Identity form with extended fields \(personal, location, tech & docs\)
- Update Website form with credentials and platform checkouts
- Update Card form with grouped sections

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Website type: replace domain with url field

- Update WebsitesList to use url instead of domain
- Update csv export config for new website fields
- Add website_type column to list view

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
